titles: A brief, pithy discourse upon I Corinthians 14. 40. Let all things be done decently and in order. Tending to search out the truth in question: Whether it be lawfull for church-governours to command and impose indifferent decent things (not absolutely necessary) in the administration of Gods worship? Written some years past by a judicious divine, and seasonable for our present times
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Corinthians, 1st XIV, 40 --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
